name: Gothic
description:
Ideal color scheme for TFT users and long-hour users with dark background and eye-resting colors.

Snapshot available at http://www.junglebit.net/vim/vimgothic.png
install_details:
Copy the script in the color folder of the vim installation directory (eg. /usr/share/vim/vim61/colors)

Insert the line "colorscheme gothic" to your ~/.vimrc file or simply call ":colorscheme gothic" from inside the Vim application

versions.release_notes: console fix and retouch of gui side
